premium_s1_text:
I am your helper in improving the quality of sleep. I will also help you become happier and improve your life!

Do you want to know how? Read on!
premium_s2_text:
Do you think you control her? Do you feel sleepy during the day? Do you take the time to do the things that make you happy? How well do you concentrate?

If the answer is no, it's time to fix it, okay?
premium_s3_text:
I am well aware of how difficult it is to carry out your duties at work or in school, to devote time to hobbies, to engage in self-development and at the same time deal with the consequences of poor sleep during the day.

Let's figure out what these consequences are and how they affect your life.
premium_s4_header: Why am I not doing anything?
premium_s4_text:
Poor sleep has consequences that make it difficult to complete a list of at least 5 to do.
Here are some of them:
premium_s4_list:
1. Deteriorating attention.
2. Problems with memory and concentration appear.
3. Lack of energy and loss of time.
premium_s4_textSecond: Instead of getting ready for bed, we usually sit on the phone late and waste time. Did you know that the light from your phone makes your brain think it's daytime and therefore you don't feel like sleeping?
premium_s5_text:
As we have already found out, poor sleep is the reason for the loss of control over life. But, you are able to take back control, feel better and do more!

I will help you break the bad habits that are ruining your life. In return, I will ask you to support the developer.
no_content_header: There is no content here yet
no_content_desc: We are working on its implementation!
breathing_guide_1: Close your lips, inhale through your nose
breathing_guide_3: Make a whooshing sound, exhaling completely through your mouth.
welcome_one_text: Hi, I'm Sleellow! I will help you improve your sleep.
welcome_two_text: Sleellow tracks your sleep time, helps you sleep better and go to bed on time!
welcome_three_text: To make it easier for you to fall asleep & feels cheerful in the morning, Sleellow offers to you useful breathing practices.
